column4: Hello I can't seem to use my nvidia driver. Can anyone help ?
how did you install it? restricted drivers manager?

in deed I am using gutsy. I was using fiesty and it was working. I upgraded gutsy it was working again . But there was a recent upgrade gutsy and enabling it in restricted drivers manager causes fails safe X to run
ive heard gutsy is broken right now, i havent updated in a couple days, but i dunno what to tell you cuz i dont know what would be wrong
